name: Jason Shapiro From Crowded Market Report
title: Why Trading Less Will Make You More Money Over Time
text:
Synopsis
Successful trading hinges on patience, discipline, and strategically limiting trade frequency to only the most promising setups.

Key Insights
- Jason Shapiro advocates for a trading approach focused on quality over quantity
- Over-trading can negatively impact portfolio performance and trader psychology
- Careful logging and systematic review of trading setups is crucial for long-term success
- Traders should resist the urge to trade out of boredom or gambling impulses
- Selective trading of only the most well-identified, high-probability opportunities is recommended
